name: Around light
description:
Controls:

W,A,S,D : movement

Space: skip dialog

E: inventory

Q: Map (you need one obviusly)

If character disapears when you are transcording scene just open and close inventory.

If the games runs whit lag you can download the portable version: https://mega.nz/file/VZJjkaDA#r8IV5DbMLfMcZIw9MSDrzO4Vps8OPBJmqV0mb-1uDtc
